means: unambitious（无雄心大志的；无野心的；无抱负的）的变形

sentence.Network_en: He does his job, but he works unambitiously.
sentence.Network_cn: 他是工作, 但工作不进取.

PerfectNetExp.abs: unambitious a无野心的,无雄心的;谦虚的unambitiously adv无雄心地unambitiousness n无雄心;谦虚;朴实

list.abs: He was an unambitious man destined for a commonplace job ., 他是一个没有野心的人 , 注定要找一个平凡的工作.
He does his job , but he works unambitiously ., 他是工作 , 但工作不进取.
he does his job , but he works unambitiously ., 他做他的工作 , 但没有任何抱负.
词目:庸碌拼音 :yōng lù 近义词 :平庸、平凡、无为反义词 :突出、代表基本解释: [be mediocre and unambitious] 平庸而无所作为庸碌无能.
伯庸,Borong,音标,读音,... ... ) Fool have fortune. 庸人庸福。 ) mediocre and unambitious;common and unremarkable 庸庸碌碌.
